an5.19:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu neva attahitaya patipanno hoti, no parahitaya.
an5.19:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attana na silasampanno hoti, no param silasampadaya samadapeti;
an5.19:1.4: attana na samadhisampanno hoti, no param samadhisampadaya samadapeti;
an5.19:1.5: attana na pannasampanno hoti, no param pannasampadaya samadapeti;
an5.19:1.6: attana na vimuttisampanno hoti, no param vimuttisampadaya samadapeti;
an5.19:1.7: attana na vimuttinanadassanasampanno hoti, no param vimuttinanadassanasampadaya samadapeti.
an5.19:1.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu neva attahitaya patipanno hoti, no parahitaya”ti.
